an1.21:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed like this, is as useless as the mind.
an1.22:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed like this, is as workable as the mind.
an1.23:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed like this, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.23:1.2: An undeveloped mind is very harmful.”
an1.24:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed like this, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.24:1.2: A developed mind is very beneficial.”
an1.25:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed, with such untapped potential, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.25:1.2: An undeveloped mind, with untapped potential, is very harmful.”
an1.26:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed, with its potential realized, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.26:1.2: A developed mind, with its potential realized, is very beneficial.”
an1.27:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.27:1.2: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind is very harmful.”
an1.28:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed and cultivated, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.28:1.2: A developed and cultivated mind is very beneficial.”
an1.29:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated, brings such suffering as the mind.
an1.29:1.2: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind brings suffering.”
an1.30:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed and cultivated, brings such happiness as the mind.
an1.30:1.2: A developed and cultivated mind brings happiness.”
